## Discussion

The cell looks for the tag constants described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/menu-tags] to determine how to populate the menu with items related to recent searches. For an example of how you might set up the search menu template, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/SearchFields/Articles/MenuTemplate.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20002245].

# searchMenuTemplate

**Instance Property**

The menu object used to dynamically construct the search field’s pop-up icon menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var searchMenuTemplate: NSMenu? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The cell looks for the tag constants described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/menu-tags] to determine how to populate the menu with items related to recent searches. For an example of how you might set up the search menu template, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/SearchFields/Articles/MenuTemplate.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20002245].
title: searchMenuTemplate
